pkgmetadata.longdescription: Provides an interface to the agent-based modelling platform NetLogo // Interface to use and access Wilensky's NetLogo (Wilensky 1999) from R using either headless (no GUI) or interactive GUI mode. Provides functions to load models, execute commands, and get values from reporters. Mostly analogous to the NetLogo Mathematica Link http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/docs/mathematica.html
